Pre-Game Insights: Ben Stokes is likely to play in ENG vs SA match.
England face selection dilemma as Ben Stokes returns to revive World Cup 2023 campaign.
Ben Stokes' return presents a dilemma for the English side.
England must make a tough decision to accommodate Stokes in the playing XI.
They can either sacrifice the depth in their bowling attack or persist with a batting lineup that looks top-heavy and potentially precarious.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's selection dilemma revolves around Ben Stokes' return and the potential inclusion of Harry Brook and Liam Livingstone in the same XI.
England's batting struggles in two out of their three matches make the prospect of playing both Brook and Stokes in the same XI more appealing.
The inclusion of both Woakes and Curran would leave England with Gus Atkinson as the only alternative.
England can alleviate concerns about their tail-end batting order by opting to replace Curran with Stokes.
England become a much stronger side with Ben Stokes' inclusion.
